Author: GitHub
Title: Your prompt just became an executable file
Description:
Did you know you can turn your most complex GitHub Copilot prompts into executable files in VS Code? Learn how to use prompt files to save, share, and run detailed instructions with a single click. This is the key to powerful context engineering and a more efficient AI workflow.

#AI #GitHubCopilot #VSCode
